content:
ShardKey ShardKey Class

In this Article

Edit

Shard key value. Wraps the type and value and allows normalization/denormalization for serialization.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class ShardKey : IComparable<ShardKey>, IEquatable<ShardKey>Public NotInheritable Class ShardKey
